achievements.name: Getting Started
achievements.description: Complete the Tutorial.

achievements.name: Getting Started (part 2)
achievements.description: Build 10 or more units in a single match, online or offline, win or lose.

achievements.name: Destroy 10 Tanks
achievements.description: Destroy 10 Tanks with your AirMech, in a single match; online or offline.

achievements.name: Destroy 1000 Tanks
achievements.description: Destroy 1000 Tanks with your AirMech, over the lifetime of your account.

achievements.name: Destroy 20 Tanks
achievements.description: Destroy 20 Tanks with your AirMech, in a single match; online or offline.

achievements.name: Destroy 50 Tanks
achievements.description: Destroy 50 Tanks with your AirMech, in a single match; online or offline.

achievements.name: Win online Match
achievements.description: Be on the winning team in any match online!

achievements.name: Win 10 online Matches
achievements.description: Win 10 Online Matches

achievements.name: Win 1v2 Match
achievements.description: Win a 1v2 Match against AIs on any map.

achievements.name: Win 1v3 Match
achievements.description: Win a 1v3 Match against AIs on any map.

achievements.name: Fast Win 1v3 Match
achievements.description: Win a 1v3 Match against AIs on any map in under 10 minutes.

achievements.name: Replicators Down! (part 1)
achievements.description: Win a Match on any map without building anything.

achievements.name: Replicators Down! (part 2)
achievements.description: Win a Match on any map in 1v2 mode without building anything.

achievements.name: Close Encounter (part 1)
achievements.description: Abduct 10 Enemy units with the Saucer, on any map, win or lose.

achievements.name: Close Encounter (part 2)
achievements.description: Abduct 25 Enemy units with the Saucer, on any map, and win the match.

achievements.name: Helix Superiority (part 1)
achievements.description: Use the air missiles on the Helix to destroy 5 or more enemy AirMechs in a single match.

achievements.name: Helix Superiority (part 2)
achievements.description: Use the ground rockets on the Helix to destroy 30 or more enemy units in a single match.

achievements.name: Bomber Superiority (part 1)
achievements.description: Use the Bomber AirMech to destroy 30 or more enemy units with the Bombs ability in a single match.

achievements.name: Bomber Superiority (part 2)
achievements.description: Use the Bomber AirMech's melee attack to decimate 30 or more enemy units in a single match.

achievements.name: Striker Superiority (part 1)
achievements.description: Use the Striker AirMech's power sword melee attack to destroy 10 or more enemy units in a single match.  Online or Offline.

achievements.name: Striker Superiority (part 2)
achievements.description: Use the Striker AirMech's power sword melee attack to destroy 15 or more enemy units and 2 or more enemy AirMechs in a single match.  Online or Offline.

achievements.name: Striker Superiority (part 3)
achievements.description: Use the Striker AirMech's power sword melee attack to destroy 20 or more enemy units and 3 or more enemy AirMechs in a single Online match, and win.

achievements.name: Striker Samurai
achievements.description: Use the Striker AirMech's power sword melee attack to destroy 1000 or more enemy units over the lifetime of your account.

achievements.name: Osprey Debut
achievements.description: Use the Osprey AirMech to help win an Online Co-op match against AI.

achievements.name: Osprey - Combat Support
achievements.description: Use the Osprey AirMech to heal friendly units and AirMechs.

achievements.name: Mine Layer (part 1)
achievements.description: Use mines to destroy at least 15 enemy units in a match, and go on to win the match.

achievements.name: Mine Layer (part 2)
achievements.description: Destroy 1000 enemy Units with Mines.

achievements.name: Mine Sweeper (part 1)
achievements.description: Deactivate 5 or more enemy mines in a single online match, and win.

achievements.name: Mine Sweeper (part 2)
achievements.description: Deactivate 50 or more enemy mines.

achievements.name: Mine Sweeper (part 3)
achievements.description: Deactivate 200 or more enemy mines.

achievements.name: High Level
achievements.description: Reach Level 10 in any AirMech in an online or offline game.

achievements.name: Max Level
achievements.description: Reach Level 15 in any AirMech in an online or offline game.

achievements.name: Miser
achievements.description: Reach Level 10 in any AirMech in an online or offline game and win without spending any Ability points.

achievements.name: A Win without Tanks
achievements.description: Win a match, online or offline, without building any Tanks.

achievements.name: A Win without Turrets
achievements.description: Win a match, online or offline, without building any Turrets.

achievements.name: Replicators Failing!
achievements.description: Win a match, online or offline, without building any Tanks or Turrets.

achievements.name: My hands are clean...
achievements.description: Win a match, online or offline, without destroying any Units with your AirMech.  Let your units do the dirty work!

achievements.name: Gladiator
achievements.description: Accumulate 100 Direct AirMech Kills online against human opponents.

achievements.name: AirMech Phalanx
achievements.description: Shoot down 500 enemy missiles.

achievements.name: Destroy 1000 Creeps
achievements.description: Destroy 1000 Creeps with your AirMech, over the lifetime of your account.

achievements.name: Death from Above
achievements.description: Destroy 1000 Enemy Units with your Artillery, over the lifetime of your account.

achievements.name: Kicking Tires
achievements.description: Use each of the AirMech types at least once in game; online or offline.

achievements.name: Blood Thirsty
achievements.description: Destroy 3 Human piloted AirMechs in the first 3 minutes of an online match.

achievements.name: Can't Touch This
achievements.description: Destroy 100 Anti-Air enemy units (HAAT and Seeker).

achievements.name: Turret Breaker
achievements.description: Destroy 200 enemy Turrets with Bombs.

achievements.name: Boosted
achievements.description: Win a match, online or offline, using Boosters, all in Air mode.

achievements.name: Mince Meat
achievements.description: Get 300 unit kills using Gatties.

achievements.name: Project Lehman
achievements.description: Destroy 100 Money Makers

achievements.name: Map Control (part 1)
achievements.description: Capture 3 neutral outposts in a single online game and win.

achievements.name: Map Control (part 2)
achievements.description: Capture 50 neutral outposts.

achievements.name: Map Control (part 3)
achievements.description: Re-capture 250 enemy controlled outposts.

achievements.name: Fortress Assault (part 1)
achievements.description: Inflict 500 damage on the Enemy Fort's shields with your AirMech in an online match and win.

achievements.name: Fortress Assault (part 2)
achievements.description: Accumulate 10,000 damage inflicted on the armor of your enemies Fortresses.

achievements.name: Nerves of Steel
achievements.description: Accumulate 10 human piloted enemy AirMech kills each made while your own health is less than 5%.

achievements.name: Damage Inc.
achievements.description: Do 1,000,000 damage with your AirMech.

achievements.name: Master Thief
achievements.description: Abduct 200 Enemy units with the Saucer.

achievements.name: Hellfire
achievements.description: Use the ground rockets on the Helix to destroy 500 enemy units.

achievements.name: Kill 250 Tanks
achievements.description: Destroy 250 Tanks with your AirMech, over the lifetime of your account.

achievements.name: Moving on Up
achievements.description: Win an online match after reaching player level 10

achievements.name: Going Pro
achievements.description: Win an online match after reaching player level 20

achievements.name: King of the Mountain
achievements.description: Win an online match after reaching player level 30

achievements.name: On a Roll
achievements.description: Win 3 consecutive online matches.

achievements.name: Rock you like a Hurricane!
achievements.description: Win an online game where 100% of the enemy's base health is taken within 1 minute before being destroyed.

achievements.name: Interceptor
achievements.description: Accumulate 20 human piloted enemy AirMech kills, each made while the enemy is carrying a unit.

achievements.name: Finish Him!
achievements.description: Make the killing blow on the enemy fort with your AirMech in an online game, 5 times.

achievements.name: Called to Duty
achievements.description: Win a match using only infantry units.

achievements.name: New Pair of Shoes
achievements.description: Win in an online match using a custom skin

achievements.name: Costume Quest
achievements.description: Win in a 3v3 PVP with all teammates using different custom skins

achievements.name: Masquerade Ball
achievements.description: Win in a 3v3 PVP with all players using different custom skins

achievements.name: Valedictorian
achievements.description: Win in a 3v3 online game at least 3 levels above anyone else.

achievements.name: Tank Killer
achievements.description: Destroy 10 Tanks from the Air with the Warthog AirMech

achievements.name: Creep Killer
achievements.description: Destroy 50 Creeps from the Air with the Warthog AirMech

achievements.name: Guns Blazin'
achievements.description: Destroy 10 enemy AirMechs in ground form from your airborn Warthog.

achievements.name: From Below
achievements.description: Destroy 10 enemy AirMechs in air form from your grounded Warthog.

achievements.name: Let's do this
achievements.description: Complete 10 matched games.

achievements.name: Coming back for more!
achievements.description: Complete 100 matched games.

achievements.name: Match made in heaven
achievements.description: Win 20 matched games.

achievements.name: Serious Competitor
achievements.description: Win 200 matched games.

achievements.name: So good!
achievements.description: Share 28 cakes.

achievements.name: Can't stop eating!
achievements.description: Share 496 cakes.

achievements.name: I put on my robe and Santa hat.
achievements.description: Win in an online match with a total Team Holiday Spirit of 100% or greater.

achievements.name: Deck the halls!
achievements.description: Win in an online match with a total Team Holiday Spirit of 250% or greater.

achievements.name: FA LA LA LA LA, LA LA LA LA!
achievements.description: Win in an online match with a total Team Holiday Spirit of 500% or greater.

achievements.name: Functional and Stylish
achievements.description: Win in an online match with a total Team Style of 100% or greater.

achievements.name: 20% Cooler
achievements.description: Win in an online match with a total Team Style of 250% or greater.

achievements.name: Do a barrel roll!
achievements.description: Win in an online match with a total Team Style of 500% or greater.

achievements.name: United in Combat
achievements.description: Join or create a Faction

achievements.name: Power Play +2
achievements.description: In a 2v2 Matchmade game, be in a position where all enemy AirMechs are destroyed while your teams is full force.

achievements.name: Challenger: 12 Stars
achievements.description: Accumulate 12 Stars in the Challenges

achievements.name: Challenger: 24 Stars
achievements.description: Accumulate 24 Stars in the Challenges

achievements.name: Challenger: 36 Stars
achievements.description: Accumulate 36 Stars in the Challenges
